commands.name: az vmware private-cloud create
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud create --name
                               --resource-group
                               --sku
                               [--accept-eula]
                               [--cluster-size]
                               [--ext-nw-blocks]
                               [--internet {Disabled, Enabled}]
                               [--location]
                               [--mi-system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--network-block]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--nsxt-password]
                               [--secondary-zone]
                               [--strategy {DualZone, SingleZone}]
                               [--tags]
                               [--vcenter-password]
                               [--virtual-network-id]
                               [--zone]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud delete
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud delete [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--yes]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud disable-cmk-encryption
commands.summary: Disable a Customer Managed Keys Encryption from a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud enable-cmk-encryption
commands.summary: Enable a Customer Managed Keys Encryption to a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud list-admin-credentials
commands.summary: List the admin credentials for the private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud rotate-nsxt-password
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud rotate-nsxt-password [--ids]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--private-cloud]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--yes]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud rotate-vcenter-password
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud rotate-vcenter-password [--ids]
                                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--private-cloud]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
                                                [--yes]
examples: az vmware private-cloud rotate-vcenter-password --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud update
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud update [--add]
                               [--cluster-size]
                               [--dns-zone-type {Private, Public}]
                               [--ext-nw-blocks]
                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--hosts]
                               [--ids]
                               [--internet {Disabled, Enabled}]
                               [--name]
                               [--network-block]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--nsxt-password]
                               [--remove]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--set]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--tags]
                               [--vcenter-password]
                               [--vsan-datastore-name]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
